*Component items*:
  * *Genitalia - sensations* (genitalia-sensory)
   * *Genitalia - utetovaginal visceral receptors* (utetovaginal-visceral-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): sexual sensations
   * *Genitalia - visceral sexual receptors* (visceral-sexual-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): sexual sensations
  * *Genitalia - urination and support muscles* (genitalia-urination)
   * *Genitalia - bulbospongiosus muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] -> bulbospongiosus-muscle): in males, empties the urethra; in females, clenches the vagina
   * *Genitalia - pubococcygeus muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> pubococcygeus-muscle): controls urine flow and contracts during orgasm
  * *Genitalia - erection muscles* (genitalia-erection)
   * *Genitalia - ischiocavernosus muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] -> ischiocavernosus-muscle): stabilize the erect penis or (in females) tense the vagina during orgasm
   * *Genitalia - man erection muscles* (genitalia-erection-man)
    * *Genitalia - corpus cavernosum penis* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PPG AVA.PN.PSYM.PPG] -> corpus-cavernosum-penis): penile erection; simultaneously the ischiocavernosus and bulbospongiosus muscles compress the veins of the corpora cavernosa restricting the egress and circulation of this blood
   * *Genitalia - woman erection muscles* (genitalia-erection-woman)
    * *Genitalia - uterus, sympathetic contractors* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> uterus-sympathetic): contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, decreased blood flow, loss of erection
    * *Genitalia - parasympathetic uterus vasodilators* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PPG AVA.PN.PSYM.PPG] -> uterus-parasympathetic): female - contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, increased blood flow; sexual response by directing blood flow to the pelvis and to the external genitalia, including the ovaries, vagina, labia, and clitoris
    * *Genitalia - vagina, sympathetic vasoconstrictors* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> vagina-sympathetic): vasoconstriction of fibromuscular tube, loss of erection
    * *Genitalia - parasympathetic vaginal vasodilators* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PPG AVA.PN.PSYM.PPG] -> vagina-parasympathetic): female - contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, increased blood flow
    * *Genitalia - corpus cavernosum clitoridis* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PPG AVA.PN.PSYM.PPG] -> corpus-cavernosum-clitoridis): clitoral erection; simultaneously the ischiocavernosus and bulbospongiosus muscles compress the veins of the corpora cavernosa restricting the egress and circulation of this blood
  * *Genitalia - ejaculation muscles and glands, pregnancy and lifecycle support* (genitalia-ejaculation)
   * *Genitalia - man ejaculation muscles and glands* (genitalia-ejaculation-man)
    * *Genitalia - cowper gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> cowper-gland): produces a clear, salty, viscous secretion known as pre-ejaculate, homologous to Bartholin glands in females
    * *Genitalia - prostate gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> prostate-gland): secrete a slightly alkaline fluid, milky or white in appearance, constitutes 50-75 percents of the volume of the semen along with spermatozoa and seminal vesicle fluid
    * *Genitalia - vas deferens* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> vas-deferens): male - emission (prior to ejaculation), contracts, propelling sperm forward
    * *Genitalia - deep transverse perineal muscle, penis* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] -> deep-transverse-perineal-muscle-penis): fixation of central tendon of perineum, support of pelvic floor, expulsion of semen in males and last drops of urine in both sexes
   * *Genitalia - woman ejaculation muscles and glands* (genitalia-ejaculation-woman)
    * *Genitalia - bartholin gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> bartholin-gland): secretes mucus to lubricate the vagina
    * *Genitalia - skenes gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> skenes-gland): cause female ejaculation and G-Spot orgasms
    * *Genitalia - cervix* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> cervix-gland): female - produces cervical mucus that changes in consistency during the menstrual cycle to prevent or promote pregnancy
    * *Genitalia - deep transverse perineal muscle, clitoris* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] -> deep-transverse-perineal-muscle-clitoris): fixation of central tendon of perineum, support of pelvic floor and last drops of urine in both sexes
  * *Genitalia - scrotum muscles* (genitalia-scrotum-muscles)
   * *Genitalia - cremaster muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> cremaster-muscle): raise and lower the scrotum, acts quickly, it is a reflex
   * *Genitalia - dartos muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_IMG AVA.PN.SYM.IMG] -> dartos-muscle): corrugates the scrotum; contraction reduces the surface area available for heat loss, thus reducing heat loss and warming the testicles; expansion increases the surface area, promoting heat loss and thus cooling the testicles.
